name: CSV to BT cache loader
description: A pipeline that loads BT cache from its csv representations.

parameters.name: inputFile
parameters.label: Input file
parameters.helpText: The Cloud Storage path to the CSV file.

parameters.name: completionFile
parameters.label: Completion file
parameters.helpText: The GCS completion file (prefixed with gs://).

parameters.name: bigtableProjectId
parameters.label: GCP Bigtable project id
parameters.helpText: The Google Cloud project ID for the Cloud Bigtable instance.

parameters.name: bigtableInstanceId
parameters.label: Bigtable instance id
parameters.helpText: The Google Cloud Bigtable instance ID.

parameters.name: bigtableTableId
parameters.label: Bigtable table id
parameters.helpText: The Cloud Bigtable table ID in the instance.

parameters.name: tempLocation
parameters.label: GCP temp location
parameters.helpText: A GCS bucket where the running jobs will have access to.
